post.text: Weapons of war like those used in Orlando and San Bernardino have no place on our streets.

comment.author: Megan
comment.text: We need to protect ourselves from the people YOU pissed off with your failed foreign policy. You are a disgrace to true patriots and should rot in jail.

replies.author: Skyler
replies.text: Megan, just who has your candidate pissing off constantly? It seems like there's a big connection with him and the terrorists.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: We messed up the Middle East since the 70's!!! Her go to jail? Right after Reagan and both Bush's!!!

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: She voted for the war in Iraq.She cost 4 American lives in Libya before she overthrew Qadafi. Now look at that poor failed state. It's on her and she is unqualified to lead the country.Just like your hero Obama.

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: Do your homework before you comment.
